meanings.sent1: She toused her hair before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: The wind toused the leaves on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy toused the pile of papers on the desk.
meanings.sent4: The storm toused the calm waters of the lake.
meanings.sent5: The children toused the sandcastle, leaving it in disarray.

meanings.sent1: He toused the heavy box onto the truck.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic toused the engine parts to fix the car.
meanings.sent3: The chef toused the dough to prepare the bread.
meanings.sent4: The wrestler toused his opponent in the ring.
meanings.sent5: The gardener toused the soil to plant the flowers.
